name: Breastplate of the Crusader
description: A shining plate that symbolizes the resolve of a valiant warrior.

name: Robes of the Archmagi
description: Elegant robes that amplify the arcane abilities of the wearer.

name: Platemail of the High King
description: Regal platemail worn by the noble ruler of the realm.

name: Vestments of the Shadowmaster
description: Shadowy vestments that grant mastery over darkness and stealth.

name: Chestguard of the Drakescale
description: Armor made from the scales of mighty drakes, offering fire resistance.
